MajorClaims.Text: other celebrities do lead young people in the right direction
this is not necessarily the case for those celebrities who are ambitious in their jobs

Claims.Text: some celebrities misguide young people by showing their external wealth and appearance
the attention of young people may become focused on chasing the dream of celebrity status
other celebrities do set up role models to young people because of their visible accomplishments

Premises.Text: some celebrities tend to show off their images in front of the public
some movie starts enjoy wearing luxury brand clothes and showing their expensive life style in front of the media, thereby gaining the public attention
If they continue to behave in such a way, it will create a misleading image to young people who may think that extraordinary life can be achieved without hard work
celebrities such as sports player whose performance and professional skills can be directly seen by their fans
people understand that the great deal of efforts on training is directly linked to their results
this kind of self-made celebrity can inspire children to develop their talents through application and perseverance
other celebrities such as musician also have achieved great success in their career
Take Michael Jackson as an example, his works are widely spread around the world, and have been extremely welcomed by the younger generation
His songs spread the idea that people should care about each other, which suggests to young people how to become a good member of society
